title: 1089 1 "Entering a New Chapter! Luffy and Sabo's Paths!"Transliteration: "Shinshō Totsunyū! Rufi to Sabo no Shinro!" (Japanese:新章突入！ルフィとサボの針路！) Nozomu Shishido Jin Tanaka Ziwei He, Keisuke Mori, Shūichi Itō & Midori Matsuda January 7, 2024(2024-01-07) 3.3%[6]
transformers_text:
1089 1 "Entering a New Chapter! Luffy and Sabo's Paths!"Transliteration: "Shinshō Totsunyū! Rufi to Sabo no Shinro!" (Japanese:新章突入！ルフィとサボの針路！) Nozomu Shishido Jin Tanaka Ziwei He, Keisuke Mori, Shūichi Itō & Midori Matsuda January 7, 2024(2024-01-07) 3.3%[6]

After leaving Wano, the Straw Hats pursue the final Road Poneglyph, vital to Luffy's dream of becoming the King of the Pirates. Meanwhile, Sabo's communication with the Revolutionary Army is abruptly halted by the Marines, resulting in the destruction of Lulusia. Later, while the Straw Hats rescue a girl from the sea, they encounter a massive shark that threatens their ship.
